optimizations.title: Activate trial feedback loop
optimizations.description: Zero trial feedback submissions. Missing critical retention signal.
optimizations.benefit: Early churn detection, personalized intervention, higher trial→paid conversion
optimizations.implementation: Add exit-intent survey on trial cancellation. Email on day 5 of trial: 'How's it going? Quick feedback?' Offer support escalation for negative feedback.

optimizations.title: Establish performance baseline
optimizations.description: System is operational. Consider adding performance SLOs.
optimizations.benefit: Proactive performance monitoring, early degradation detection
optimizations.implementation: Define SLOs: p95 latency <500ms, error rate <1%, uptime >99.9%. Add alerting via /api/metrics/app.
